column1: The Purple Pig////The waiter suggested 3-4 dishes between two people
column2: so we got the crispy pork ear as appetizer
column3: pork shoulder and half duck as entry
column4: and eventually latte and Sicilian iris as desert. The food was quite extraordinary. Crispy pig ear was certainly innovative and fun to start with
column6: the half duck impressed me and the portion was generous
column7: and finally the Sicilian Iris was rich and delightful.
